Benefits of working with GlobalOpt

Offices in China and Russia Offices are located in Moscow, the capital of Russia. And in Guangzhou, China's world trade metropolis.

We declare the goods with optimization We are going to meet our customers and help to clear the goods with the optimization of codes and rates.

Qualified staffOur employees have extensive experience in logistics with China and are fluent in Chinese and English.

We are looking for manufacturersWe help our customers find the product or manufacturer you are interested in in China.

Own warehouse in ChinaWarehouse in China allows us to collect and inspect and pack your goods before shipping.

Money transfer to ChinaWe help to transfer and pay for goods in China on preferential terms

We make wholesale deliveriesWe take care of all the issues associated with the purchase, quality control, logistics and customs clearance. You only need to fill out the terms of reference, approve samples of goods and then accept the goods in your warehouse!

Production trip to ChinaWe have extensive experience in business trips around China. With great joy and desire, we will organize such a trip to China. We will make a visa, transfer from the airport, reserve a hotel, provide an interpreter. We organize a trip to production. Shop tour. Furniture tour.
